thi-ap30:3.1: 10 Yasodharāpamukhaaṭṭhārasabhikkhunīsahassaapadāna → aṭṭhārasabhikkhunīsahassāpadānaṃ (bj) | aṭṭhārasatherīsahassānamapadānaṃ (s2, s3) | yasodharāpamukhāni aṭṭhārasabhikkhunī sahassāni apadānaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap30:21.1: jānāmi → jānāma (bj, s2, s3, pts1, c1)
thi-ap30:25.4: cattāni jīvitāni no → sañcattaṃ jīvitampi no (s2, s3)
thi-ap30:63.4: Pappotha → pappotha (s2, s3) | santasaṃkhatadoso yo pappotha (pts1) | pajjotaṃ (mr)
thi-ap30:69.4: ca sattatimeva ca → aṭṭhasattatimeva ca (s2, s3, pts1)
